contextId.information: This is a way to say there is a huge amount of something. AT: "there is a huge amount of it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: there is no end to it

contextId.information: The merchants of Nineveh are as impossible to count as the stars in the sky. AT: "You have more merchants than anyone could count." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: You have multiplied your merchants more than the stars in the heavens
